scripts.pgmd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate down && node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up && npm run dev
scripts.pgmp: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate down && node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up && npm start
scripts.pgm: cross-env POSTGRES_CONNECTION_DEV_URL=postgres://meetee_admin:meetee_admin@meeteedb.cnkpi2hqmiv1.ap-southeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/meetee node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate down && node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up
scripts.int2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:rollback --knexfile config/knexfile.js && knex migrate:latest --knexfile config/knexfile.js
scripts.int3: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:rollback --knexfile config/knexfile.js && knex migrate:latest --knexfile config/knexfile.js && knex seed:run --knexfile config/knexfile.js && npm run pgmigration
scripts.prodint3: cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:rollback --knexfile config/knexfile.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:latest --knexfile config/knexfile.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run --knexfile config/knexfile.js && npm run pgmigration && npm run dev
scripts.dbmax: npm run int3 && npm run pgmigration
scripts.proddbmax: npm run prodint3 && npm run pgmigration
